rows.text: We know that as a caregiver, there are many demands on your time. While you might have your child around you for large parts of the day, it isn't always easy to focus all of your attention on your child.
rows.title: Time with your child

intro_text.eng: Let’s start with exploring ways to connect with our children.

outro_text.eng: We all spend time doing things with our children, but connecting with them is not always easy. We face many distractions, concerns and challenges that make it difficult to connect with our children. In addition - our children might do or say things that we find frustrating and draining.

rows.intro_text: Let’s start with exploring ways to connect with our children.
rows.outro_text: We all spend time doing things with our children, but connecting with them is not always easy. We face many distractions, concerns and challenges that make it difficult to connect with our children. In addition - our children might do or say things that we find frustrating and draining.

rows.title: Time for yourself

intro_text.eng:
Being a parent means caring for your 
children AND for yourself.

rows.intro_text:
Being a parent means caring for your 
children AND for yourself.

rows.title: Being interrupted

outro_text.eng:
Most parts of a child’s day are dictated by the rules and plans of adults.

As adults, we lead the way for our children in terms of most of their activities. Children have very little say. Most adults struggle when they feel they don’t have a say or aren’t in control. Children are the same.

rows.outro_text:
Most parts of a child’s day are dictated by the rules and plans of adults.

As adults, we lead the way for our children in terms of most of their activities. Children have very little say. Most adults struggle when they feel they don’t have a say or aren’t in control. Children are the same.

rows.title: Being joined

outro_text.eng: A great way to make your child feel seen, valued, important, is making time to join them in their world, and to let them take the lead during one-on-one time.

rows.outro_text: A great way to make your child feel seen, valued, important, is making time to join them in their world, and to let them take the lead during one-on-one time.

rows.title: Joining your child

outro_text.eng:
It is not about keeping track of a child’s behaviour to make sure they are behaving properly. It’s not about teaching them to do something or educating them.

It is a way to bond, connect, and have a positive experience with your child. It is a way for you to escape your world and join your child in their world.

rows.outro_text:
It is not about keeping track of a child’s behaviour to make sure they are behaving properly. It’s not about teaching them to do something or educating them.

It is a way to bond, connect, and have a positive experience with your child. It is a way for you to escape your world and join your child in their world.
